alert.note: Alert for Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 28 at 11:35PM AKST until March 01 at 10:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Areas of dense fog with visibility reduced to one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Juneau area, particularly along Gastineau Channel, near the airport, and portions of the Mendenhall Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Reduced visibility will affect travel. Wet surfaces may have black ice form as temperatures fall overnight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periodic showers overnight may cause visibility to improve at times.
info.instruction: An advisory means that dense fog is already occurring or imminent. All travel should be done with extreme caution.

area.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
